name: Master of Monsters: Disciples of Gaia
name_original: Master of Monsters: Disciples of Gaia
description: Choose from six of Gaia's disciples and conquer a land consisting of mountains, lakes, oceans, streams, rivers and snow to overpower the now evil master, Gaia. Conquer this fantasy land that is controlled by swords, magic and wizardry. Summon monsters, fight enemies and cleanse the Earth of chaos.
